entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
